desc: SKINS.DESIGN put together high-quality decorative products and best prices. We source all material from the heart of Brazil’s famous historic leather region. Home decor with special discount. ON SALES - Cowhide rugs / cow skins (genuine leather) from $99 - Sheepskins from $65 - Throws - pillows - place-mats.

layout.text: Create cozy stylish spaces at home with our certified leather rugs
